item.title: This Microsoft options trade creates an income stream while awaiting a snapback
item.description: Microsoft's stock tumbled 12.5% to a low print of the day of $421 on Thursday, slicing off more than $400 billion in market value.

item.title: Sandisk gets upgrade from Raymond James after blockbuster earnings
item.description: Key catalysts, including the potential for more price hikes, are driving analyst Jason Bazinet’s upgrade.

item.title: Trump finally makes his Fed chair pick — What Kevin Warsh means for investors
item.description: Investors see the former Fed governor as a credible steward of monetary policy despite expectations he may push for lower rates.

item.title: Apple’s iPhone sales surge gives analysts something to cheer, but memory concerns weigh on outlooks
item.description: Analysts were divided over the impact an AI-driven memory shortage, causing a surge in memory prices, will have on the company.

item.title: A derivative winner from the blockbuster gold rally: pawn shop stocks
item.description: Pawn shops are getting a boost as gold trades at record highs, and analysts expect gains.
